IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENCOURAGE, PROMOTE AND AID THE FULFILLMENT OF EDUCATION, RESEARCH AND SERVICE FUNCTIONS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS (U OF M) AND TO ENCOURAGE, PROMOTE AND AID THE TRANSFER OF TECHNOLOGY GENERATED IN THECOURSE OF RESEARCH BY U OF M FACULTY, STAFF AND STUDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ENCOURAGE, PROMOTE AND AID THE FULFILLMENT OF EDUCATION, RESEARCHAND SERVICE FUNCTIONS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS (U OF M) AND TOENCOURAGE, PROMOTE AND AID THE TRANSFER OF TECHNOLOGY GENERATED IN THECOURSE OF RESEARCH BY U OF M FACULTY, STAFF AND STUDENTS.
IRS990.Desc: SPONSORED RESEARCH AND OTHER EDUCATIONAL/SERVICE ACTIVITIES DEVELOPED AND ADMINISTERED ON BEHALF OF FACULTY AND STAFF OF THE UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS TOTALED 14 ACTIVE PROGRAM SERVICE PROJECTS FUNDED BY 1 UNIQUE SPONSORS, AND THE ADMINISTRATION OF SEVERAL PATENTS.THE RESEARCH FOUNDATION PROVIDES THE FOLLOWING BENEFITS FOR THEUNIVERSITY:1. FACULTY AND STAFF MAY APPLY FOR GRANTS FROM SPONSORS WHOSE ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA REQUIRES A 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATION.2. FACULTY AND STAFF MAY CONTRACT WITH SPONSORS THAT CANNOT ACCEPT TN LAWS (REQUIRED FOR UNIVERSITY CONTRACTS).3. FOR NON-COST REIMBURSABLE PROGRAM SERVICES FUNDED BY MULTIPLE SPONSORS, THE RESEARCH FOUNDATION MAINTAINS THE ACCOUNTING BY SPONSOR WHICH REDUCES THE ADMINISTRATIVE BURDEN ON UNIVERSITY ACCOUNTING STAFF

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHANGES IN EQUITY INVESTMENT IN SUBSIDIARY 89,340.

PATENTS WERE REGISTERED WITH THE U.S. PATENT OFFICE. THESE PATENTS WERE CONTRIBUTED BY THE UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS AND ARE NOT CONSIDERED QUALIFIED INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY FOR PURPOSES OF FILING THE FORM 8899.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNIVERSITY SHALL SERVE AS CHAIR OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE RESEARCH FOUNDATION AT ALL TIMES, AND HE OR HIS DESIGNEE SHALL PRESIDE OVER ALL MEETINGS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE UNIVERSITY PRESIDENT APPOINTS UNIVERSITY DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND THE ACCOUNTANT OF THE UMRF. IT IS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST TO ALL THE BOARD MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS MONITORED WITH A DISCLOSURE FORM COMPLETED ANNUALLY BY MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
CHANGES IN EQUITY INVESTMENT IN SUBSIDIARY 89,340.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: ADMINISTERS SUPPORT TO THE UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS
OPERATES AUXILIARY ENTERPRISE THAT BENEFIT THE UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS
